summary: The Hughes' cottage vacation is violently interrupted by a family on a murderous and identity-stealing journey, in search of the "perfect" life.
cast: Selma Blair|Joshua Close|James D'Arcy|Rachel Miner|Quinn Lord|Alex Ferris|Matt Bellefleur|Terence Kelly|Leanne Adachi|Brett Delaney|Debbe Hirata|Agam Darshi|Allie Bertram
keywords: home invasion|husband wife relationship|psychopath|family in danger|mother son relationship
title: In Their Skin
